FROM d_m${localChannelId} m JOIN d_mm${localChannelId} mm ON mm.message_id = m.id
LEFT JOIN d_mcm${localChannelId} mcm ON mcm.message_id = mm.message_id AND mcm.metadata_id = mm.id
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_raw ON mc_raw.message_id = m.id AND mc_raw.metadata_id = 0 AND mc_raw.content_type = 1 AND mc_raw.is_encrypted = FALSE
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_processed_raw ON mc_processed_raw.message_id = m.id AND mc_processed_raw.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_processed_raw.content_type = 2 AND mc_processed_raw.is_encrypted = FALSE
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_transformed ON mc_transformed.message_id = m.id AND mc_transformed.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_transformed.content_type = 3 AND mc_transformed.is_encrypted = FALSE
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_encoded ON mc_encoded.message_id = m.id AND mc_encoded.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_encoded.content_type = 4 AND mc_encoded.is_encrypted = FALSE
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_sent ON mc_sent.message_id = m.id AND mc_sent.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_sent.content_type = 5 AND mc_sent.is_encrypted = FALSE
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_response ON mc_response.message_id = m.id AND mc_response.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_response.content_type = 6 AND mc_response.is_encrypted = FALSE
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_response_transformed ON mc_response_transformed.message_id = m.id AND mc_response_transformed.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_response_transformed.content_type = 7 AND mc_response_transformed.is_encrypted = FALSE
LEFT JOIN d_mc${localChannelId} mc_processed_response ON mc_processed_response.message_id = m.id AND mc_processed_response.metadata_id = mm.id AND mc_processed_response.content_type = 8 AND mc_processed_response.is_encrypted = FALSE

mapper.select:
SELECT id, server_id, received_date, processed, import_id, import_channel_id
FROM d_m${localChannelId} WHERE id = #{messageId}

SELECT m.id, m.server_id, m.received_date, m.processed, m.import_id, m.import_channel_id
FROM d_m${localChannelId} m JOIN d_mm${localChannelId} mm ON mm.message_id = m.id AND mm.id = 0
LEFT JOIN d_mm${localChannelId} mm_skip ON mm_skip.message_id = m.id AND mm_skip.status IN
#{status}
WHERE mm.received_date < #{dateThreshold}
AND m.processed = TRUE
AND mm_skip.id IS NULL
ORDER BY m.id
OFFSET ${offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${limit} ROWS ONLY
